trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for a script control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una classe base astratta per un controllo script.

trans-unit.source: ScriptControl inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: ScriptControl eredita la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>classe e implementa il <xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl>interfaccia.</xref:System.Web.UI.IScriptControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class is a base class for ASP.NET Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>classe è una classe base per i controlli server Web ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptControl is an abstract class, which you cannot instantiate directly.
trans-unit.target: ScriptControl è una classe astratta, è possibile creare istanze direttamente.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you derive a class based on this abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, si deriva una classe in base a questa classe astratta.

trans-unit.source: The ScriptControl base class tests the page for a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control during the `PreRender` stage of the derived control.
trans-unit.target: La classe di base ScriptControl verifica pagina per un <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controllare durante i `PreRender` fase del controllo derivato.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptControl base class also makes sure that the derived control calls methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control to register script during the `Render` event.
trans-unit.target: La classe di base ScriptControl assicura anche che il controllo derivato chiama i metodi del <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controllo da registrare script durante la `Render` evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: This includes registering <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects for the ScriptControl when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: È inclusa la registrazione <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>oggetti per ScriptControl quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A> method makes sure that <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> objects are not rendered unless the ScriptControl itself is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A>metodo consente di verificare che <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor>oggetti non viene eseguiti a meno che non viene eseguito il rendering ScriptControl stesso.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptControl.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables a ScriptControl to work inside a closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo un ScriptControl operare all'interno di un oggetto chiuso <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You can add as many descriptors and types as necessary to any class that you derive from ScriptControl.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere tutti i descrittori e i tipi necessari a qualsiasi classe derivata da ScriptControl.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptControl"></xref> class in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptControl"> </xref> classe in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce il <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> oggetti per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>insieme di <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> oggetti.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the script files for the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce i file di script per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>raccolta che contiene i file di ECMAScript (JavaScript) che sono stati registrati come risorse incorporate.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*> event and registers the script control with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*>eventi e registri di controllo script con il <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender*>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event of the base class is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method registers the script control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Dopo il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>della classe di evento, il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>metodo registra il controllo script con il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>oggetto che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*> event and sends server control content to a provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object, which writes the content to be rendered to the browser.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*>eventi e Invia contenuto del controllo server a un oggetto fornito <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> oggetto, che scrive il contenuto da sottoporre a rendering nel browser.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that receives the server control content.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> oggetto che riceve il contenuto del controllo server.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, registers the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, registra il <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> oggetti per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>insieme di <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptDescriptor"> </xref> oggetti.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, registers script files for the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, registra i file di script per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection that contains ECMAScript (JavaScript) files that have been registered as embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>raccolta che contiene i file di ECMAScript (JavaScript) che sono stati registrati come risorse incorporate.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>
